description: Telluride is the county seat and most populous town of San Miguel County in the southwestern portion of the U.S. state of Colorado. The town is a former silver mining camp on the San Miguel River in the western San Juan Mountains.

description: Rein is surrounded by the nature park Rieserferner-Ahrn in a scenic, high alpine location in the Reintal. The place is the starting point for a variety of mountain tours in the Durreck group and Rieserferner group.
